body_html:
@wdirons - I tried with different input values and fortunately for those values, I see x86 and ppc64le are giving same results. But not sure if Community can accept it as a fix.
@rohan100jain and others from TF Community - Request you to provide the inputs on this. Will it be okay if we just change the input values to the testcase, such that the output is same on both the platforms?

body:
@wdirons - I tried with different input values and fortunately for those values, I see x86 and ppc64le are giving same results. But not sure if Community can accept it as a fix.
@rohan100jain and others from TF Community - Request you to provide the inputs on this. Will it be okay if we just change the input values to the testcase, such that the output is same on both the platforms?
